attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All MP's and MEP's who have had embezzled money via expenses should resign and have a custodial sentence passed.  If a member of the public had acted in such a manor the we would be fired from our jobs and receive a criminal investigation. 

Why are MP's above the law?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
